fields.name: lightning_histograms
fields.title: Lightning Histogram Plot
fields.description: Three plots are created. The first is of wind speed, pressure, and a histogram of the number of lightning strokes per hour for the lightning within 1000 km of the storm center. The second is the same, but only for lightning within 100 km of the storm center. The third plot is a spectrogram showing the number of lightning strokes per three hours binned by the radial distance from the storm center.

fields.name: density_plot
fields.title: Lightning Density Plot
fields.description: Plots of daily lightning density relative to center of the storm. Daily plots are combined into an animated GIF.

fields.name: track_map
fields.title: Storm Track Map
fields.description: Track of storm center from the Naval Research Lab.

fields.name: GMI_sat_overlay_legacy
fields.title: GMI 89 GHz PCT Satellite Overaly (Legacy)
fields.description: Satellite iamges from the Naval Research Lab are overlaid with lightning strokes (shown as black circles) +/- 15 minutes of satellite image time. There may be no figures available to view if no satellite images are avialable

fields.name: SSMIS_sat_overlay_legacy
fields.title: SSMIS 91 GHz PCT Satellite Overlay (Legacy)
fields.description: Satellite images from the Naval Research Lab are overlaid with lightning strokes (shown as black circles) +/- 15 minutes of satellite image time. There may be no figures available to view if no satellite images are available.

fields.name: TMI_sat_overlay_legacy
fields.title: TMI 85 GHz PCT Satellite Overlay
fields.description: Satellite images from the Naval Research Lab are overlaid with lightning strokes (shown as black circles) +/- 15 minutes of satellite image time. There may be no figures available to view if no satellite images are avaiable.
